product_name: COSRX – Hyaluronic Acid Intensive Cream, 100ml
ingredients: COSRX – Hyaluronic Acid Intensive Cream – 100 ml – a deeply hydrating cream designed to envelope dry or dehydrated skin in lasting moisture without feeling heavy or greasy. Product contains: Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Water (~57.8%) – rich in antioxidants and essential nutrients to restore vitality and defend against environmental stress. Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid, 3 000 ppm) – potent humectant that draws in and retains moisture for a plump, smooth complexion. Panthenol (Vitamin B5) – soothes and supports the skin barrier for enhanced comfort. Macadamia Seed Oil & Sunflower Seed Oil – nourishing lipids that help lock in hydration and soften the skin’s surface. Allantoin – calms and protects sensitive or stressed skin. Product effects: deeply hydrates and replenishes moisture for soft, supple skin, strengthens and restores the skin’s barrier function, helping reduce dryness and tightness, leaves skin smoother, refreshed and with a healthy glow — without an oily or heavy finish. Recommended for: dry, dehydrated or rough skin needing a moisture boost, skin that feels tight or uncomfortable, particularly in colder or dryer conditions, those seeking a barrier-nurturing cream that still absorbs well and layers easily. How to use: After cleansing and toning, take an appropriate amount and apply evenly to the face and neck. Gently pat with fingertips until fully absorbed. Use morning and evening; follow with sunscreen during the day. Capacity: 100 ml Expiration date: see packaging. Country of origin: South Korea.

product_name: Cos de BAHA – Vitamin C Facial Serum with MSM, 30ml
ingredients: Cos De BAHA – Vitamin C Facial Serum with MSM – 30 ml – a brightening serum formulated with a stable form of vitamin C, organic sulfur (MSM), and a hydrating complex to visibly even skin tone, reduce the appearance of dark spots, and boost skin’s radiance. Suitable for many skin types, including those concerned with pigmentation, uneven texture, or dullness. Product contains: Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C derivative) – brightens the skin, reduces the appearance of dark spots, and offers antioxidant protection. MSM (Dimethyl Sulfone, “Nature’s Beauty Mineral”) – supports collagen production, helps reduce inflammation, and improves texture and elasticity. Ferulic Acid – a plant-based antioxidant that enhances the efficacy of vitamin C and provides extra protection against environmental stress. Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E derivative) – moisturizes and protects the skin, complementing vitamin C’s effects. Hyaluronic Acid – deeply hydrates, plumping the skin and reducing the appearance of fine lines. Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract & Allantoin – soothe and calm the skin, making the formula gentler and suitable for sensitive skin. Product effects: brightens dull or uneven skin tone and helps fade dark spots, improves skin texture and smoothness, hydrates and plumps the skin for a healthier glow, supports collagen and elasticity for sturdier skin, leaves skin looking clearer, refreshed, and radiant. Our cosmetologist recommends this product in case of: uneven skin tone, pigmentation or post-acne marks, dull skin lacking radiance, early signs of aging such as loss of firmness or fine lines, skin that needs both brightening and barrier-supporting care. How to use: After cleansing and toning, apply 2–3 drops of the serum evenly to the face and neck. Gently pat until fully absorbed. Follow with moisturizer and, if used in the morning, finish with sunscreen. Use morning and/or evening for best results. Capacity: 30 ml Expiration date: see packaging. Country of origin: South Korea.

product_name: Anua – Heartleaf Silky Moisture Sun Cream SPF50+ PA++++, 50ml
ingredients: Anua – Heartleaf Silky Moisture Sun Cream SPF50+ PA++++ – 50 ml – a lightweight, hydrating sunscreen that protects the skin from harmful UV rays while calming and moisturizing it. Formulated with Heartleaf (Houttuynia Cordata) Extract and Centella Asiatica , it soothes irritation, balances oil and moisture, and prevents dryness. The silky, non-sticky texture absorbs quickly without leaving a white cast, providing a smooth, natural finish — ideal for daily use on all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone skin. Product contains: Heartleaf (Houttuynia Cordata) Extract – calms redness and irritation while helping to purify and balance sensitive or acne-prone skin. Centella Asiatica Extract – promotes healing, strengthens the skin barrier, and soothes inflammation. Panthenol (Vitamin B5) – deeply hydrates and locks in moisture for long-lasting comfort. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) – brightens dull skin, refines pores, and enhances overall skin tone. Hyaluronic Acid – delivers multi-layer hydration, keeping the skin soft, supple, and plump. Allantoin – soothes and protects the skin, ensuring a gentle finish suitable for sensitive types. Product effects: provides broad-spectrum protection (SPF50+ PA++++), hydrates and nourishes the skin without heaviness, calms irritation and strengthens the barrier, absorbs quickly with a silky, non-sticky finish, leaves skin smooth, radiant, and comfortably protected. Our cosmetologist recommends this product in case of: sensitive, oily, or acne-prone skin, redness, dryness, or irritation, need for lightweight daily UV protection, preference for non-greasy, no white-cast sunscreens. How to use: Apply a moderate amount evenly over the face and neck as the last step of your morning skincare routine. Reapply every 2–3 hours when exposed to sunlight for continuous protection. Capacity: 50 ml Expiration date: see packaging. Country of origin: South Korea.

product_name: AXIS-Y – Biome Resetting Moringa Cleansing Oil, 200ml
ingredients: Axis-Y – Biome Resetting Moringa Cleansing Oil – 200 ml – a gentle, purifying cleansing oil designed to remove makeup, sunscreen, and impurities while maintaining a healthy skin barrier. Formulated with Moringa Oil and Biome Complex , it deeply cleanses pores, balances sebum, and nourishes the skin without clogging or irritation. The lightweight texture emulsifies easily, leaving the skin clean, soft, and refreshed — perfect for all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone skin. Product contains: Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil – rich in antioxidants and fatty acids that dissolve impurities, unclog pores, and nourish the skin for a smooth, radiant complexion. Jojoba Seed Oil – mimics natural skin oils to regulate sebum production and maintain hydration. Sunflower Seed Oil – softens and smooths the skin while reinforcing the natural barrier. Centella Asiatica Extract – calms irritation, reduces redness, and supports healing. Green Tea Extract – provides antioxidant protection and helps purify the skin. Probiotics + Prebiotics (Biome Complex) – strengthen the skin’s microbiome and enhance overall resilience and balance. Product effects: removes makeup, sunscreen, and excess sebum, deeply cleanses pores without stripping moisture, nourishes and strengthens the skin barrier, calms irritation and balances oil levels, leaves skin soft, clean, and refreshed. Our cosmetologist recommends this product in case of: clogged pores or blackheads, dull, congested, or oily skin, dryness or sensitivity from harsh cleansers, need for a gentle daily cleansing oil that maintains barrier health. How to use: Pump 2–3 times into dry hands and gently massage onto dry face to dissolve makeup and impurities. Add a small amount of lukewarm water to emulsify the oil into a milky texture. Rinse thoroughly and follow with your regular cleanser if desired. Use daily as the first step of your skincare routine. Capacity: 200 ml Expiration date: see packaging. Country of origin: South Korea.
